LanguageData.CAC_LightHelmet.label: CAC Cultist Light Helmet
LanguageData.CAC_LightHelmet.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Cultists.
LanguageData.CAC_LightHelmet_Prestige.label: CAC Cultist Light Helmet(Lord)
LanguageData.CAC_LightHelmet_Prestige.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Cultists.\n\nModified for improves psychic powers to the owner.
LanguageData.CAC_LightHelmet_Mechanitor.label: CAC Cultist Light Helmet(Overseer)
LanguageData.CAC_LightHelmet_Mechanitor.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Cultists.\n\nModified for improves Mechanoids Control abilities.
LanguageData.CAC_HeavyHelmet.label: CAC Cultist Heavy Helmet
LanguageData.CAC_HeavyHelmet.description: Heavy power armor Helmet, excellent protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Cultists.
LanguageData.CAC_HeavyHelmet_Prestige.label: CAC Cultist Heavy Helmet(Lord)
LanguageData.CAC_HeavyHelmet_Prestige.description: Heavy power armor Helmet, excellent protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Cultists.\n\nModified for improves psychic powers to the owner.
LanguageData.CAC_HeavyHelmet_Mechanitor.label: CAC Cultist Heavy Helmet(Overseer)
LanguageData.CAC_HeavyHelmet_Mechanitor.description: Heavy power armor Helmet, excellent protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Cultists.\n\nModified for improves Mechanoids Control abilities.
LanguageData.CAC_PriestHelmet.label: CAC Priest Helmet
LanguageData.CAC_PriestHelmet.description: Heavy power armor Helmet, excellent protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Priests.
LanguageData.CAC_LightArmor.label: CAC Cultist Light Armor
LanguageData.CAC_LightArmor.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Cultists.
LanguageData.CAC_LightArmor_Smoker.label: CAC Cultist Light Armor(Fogler)
LanguageData.CAC_LightArmor_Smoker.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Cultists.\n\nModified with the addition of a Smokepop pack.
LanguageData.CAC_LightArmor_Jump.label: CAC Cultist Light Armor(Raven)
LanguageData.CAC_LightArmor_Jump.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Cultists.\n\nModified with the addition of a Jump pack.

LanguageData.CAC_LightArmor_Prestige.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Cultists.\n\nModified for improves psychic powers to the owner.

LanguageData.CAC_LightArmor_Mechanitor.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Cultists.\n\nModified with the addition of a Mechanoids Control pack.
LanguageData.CAC_LightArmor_Turret.label: CAC Cultist Light Armor(Goblin)
LanguageData.CAC_LightArmor_Turret.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Cultists.\n\nModified with the pack that allows the user to deploy a battery-powered turret.
LanguageData.CAC_LightArmor_Swarmling.label: CAC Cultist Light Armor(Swarmling)
LanguageData.CAC_LightArmor_Swarmling.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Cultists.\n\nModified with the pack that allows the user to deploy a battery-powered drones.

LanguageData.Grenade_Armor_CAC_TurretPack.label: CAC turret pack capsule

LanguageData.CAC_PriestArmor.label: CAC Priest Armor
LanguageData.CAC_PriestArmor.description: Heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by CAC Priests.\n\nIt has a built-in module with a flare dispenser.
